QuestData.Title: Bar Fight!
QuestData.Description: Those pint-sized, goober-looking, no-explosion gnomes have got it coming!$B$BI want you to go into the Speedbarge Bar, order a bottle of grog, and hit one over the head with it!$B$BShow them that we're not going to take any more of their arrogance, $n!
QuestData.CompletionText: What? Are you deaf?$B$BYou need to go start that bar fight... now!
QuestData.RewardText: Yes! You're a real credit to the Horde!$B$BYou know, you can go back in there and do that anytime you feel like it. I highly encourage you to do so!
